name: IllegalEnchants
description: A simple plugin for allowing illegal enchants for players who have perms for it (with /enchant and anvil)
author: TopchetoEU

enchant.permission-message: You don't have the required permissions to use this command!

anvilpricelimit.description: Enables, disables or sets anvil price limit
anvilpricelimit.permission-message: You don't have the required permissions to use this command!
